item.title: Europe is about to sign a long-awaited free-trade deal with India - The Economist
item.description: Europe is about to sign a long-awaited free-trade deal with India The EconomistExclusive: India to slash tariffs on cars to 40% in trade deal with EU, sources say ReutersIndia and EU set for ‘mother of all deals’ as Trump’s tariff uncertainty looms BBCIndia-EU meet comes amid fractured world Times of India"Final Stretch": India And EU Near Conclusion Of Landmark Free Trade Deal NDTV
